DataElement.preferredName: Perceived Efficacy in Patient-Physician Interactions 3 How Confident in Ability to get Doctor to Answer All Questions Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how confident they are in their ability to get a doctor to answer all of their questions, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Perceived Efficacy in Patient-Physician Interactions How Confident in Ability to get Doctor to Answer All Questions Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A 10-item questionnaire, or 5-item subset, designed to assess a patient's confidence in obtaining medical information and attention to their medical concerns from physicians._A question about how confident an individual is in their ability to get a doctor to answer all of their questions._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A 10-item questionnaire, or 5-item subset, designed to assess a patient's confidence in obtaining medical information and attention to their medical concerns from physicians.

Concepts.definition: A 10-item questionnaire, or 5-item subset, designed to assess a patient's confidence in obtaining medical information and attention to their medical concerns from physicians.

DataElementConcept.origin: PEPPI: Perceived efficacy in Patient-Physician Interactions; Maly RC et al.; J Am Geriatr Soc. 1998

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A subjective scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective score of 1 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

Concepts.definition: A subjective score of 1 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective score of 2 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

Concepts.definition: A subjective score of 2 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective score of 3 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

Concepts.definition: A subjective score of 3 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective score of 4 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

Concepts.definition: A subjective score of 4 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective score of 5 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.

Concepts.definition: A subjective score of 5 on a confidence scale that ranges from 1: Not at all confident to 5: Very confident.
